channel.title: Power on Phantisocracy
channel.description: Recent content in Power on Phantisocracy

item.title: On Hobbies
item.description: Most hobbies that I take up seem to have a hidden element in them: They are about escaping control. Building a home server: Making sure I control my own 1s and 0s.

item.title: On Microposting
item.description: Microposting and microblogging may be the orders of the day, but this does not mean we have to submit to centralized corporate hierarchies to code up our microthoughts.
